Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Joshua Kaye to receive certain retroactive membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Joshua Kaye to receive certain retroactive membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Joshua Kaye to receive certain retroactive membership in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system
